content.title: Python-based Screenshot Capture Interface for ML Image Collection
content.description: Developed a custom screenshot capture interface using Python and Tkinter to streamline the process of gathering training images for machine learning models. This tool allows for capturing multiple screenshots of customizable pixel sizes, saving them with randomized filenames into a specified folder. It's particularly useful for automating image collection for game-related ML projects.

infoBoxes.title: Technology
infoBoxes.content: Python, Tkinter, PyAutoGUI, Pynput, PIL, Git

infoBoxes.title: Key Features
infoBoxes.content: Customizable screenshot size, Random file naming, Hotkey for program termination

items.text: This video demonstrates the program's ability to take screenshots anywhere on the screen based on a customizable capture size, showcasing its utility for ML image collection.
